actions.description: The neogi makes one Bite attack and one Claw attack, or it makes two Tentacle of Hadar attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: 6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) necrotic damage, and the target can't take reactions until the end of the neogi's next turn, as a spectral tentacle clings to the target.
actions.name: Tentacle of Hadar

actions.description:
The neogi casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14):
At will: guidance, mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation

1/day each: dimension door, hold person, hunger of Hadar
actions.name: Spellcasting

languages: Common, Deep Speech, Undercommon, telepathy 30 ft.
name: Neogi Master [MoM]

specialTraits.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the neogi's darkvision.
specialTraits.name: Devil's Sight

specialTraits.description: The neogi has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened, and magic can't put the neogi to sleep.
specialTraits.name: Mental Fortitude

specialTraits.description: The neogi can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
specialTraits.name: Spider Climb
